org.itemscript.core.values
Class ItemscriptFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.values.ItemscriptFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasSystem, JsonFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
GwtJsonFactory, StandardJsonFactory
public abstract class ItemscriptFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonFactory, HasSystem

The implementation class for a JsonFactory. Subclass this to create a new JsonFactory type.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org
